body: A childhood spent scrabbling for every possession and scrap of food has made you fierce and wary. You receive a +1 trait bonus on all Intimidate checks made to demoralize opponents and a +1 trait bonus on all Perception checks to avoid being surprised.
name: Scrapper
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Half-Orc Race Traits/Scrapper
